synopsis.text: Kibayashi Juri, an educator by profession and a spirit medium by hobby, is the central character in this captivating anime. With an uncanny knack for exorcism and an intimate knowledge of the supernatural realm, she effortlessly navigates the complexities of the afterlife. However, her understanding of the tangible world around her remains surprisingly limited, creating an intriguing contrast that forms the crux of this unique narrative. Prepare to be drawn into a world where the ordinary and the extraordinary collide in unexpected ways, as Kibayashi-sensei bridges the gap between the living and the dead.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
